name: Watchtower
short_description: Automatically update running Docker containers. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr.
description: Automatically update running Docker containers. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr. Watchtower is a self-hosted application focused on tools, utility, docker, containers. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Watchtower on your home server to automatically update running docker containers. self-host it with docker using yantr without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Watchtower to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
